doc:
Robert Gleckler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Gleckler 0 Robert Gleckler (January 11, 1887 – February 25, 1939) was an American film and stage actor who appeared in nearly 60 movies between 1927 until his death in 1939. He was cast for the role of Jonas Wilkerson, overseer of the slaves at Tara in Gone with the Wind, but died during the filming and was replaced with Victor Jory. Robert_Gleckler ( January_11_,_1887 – February_25_,_1939 ) was an_American_film_and_stage_actor who appeared in nearly_60_movies between 1927 until his_death in 1939 . He was_cast for the_role of Jonas_Wilkerson , overseer of the_slaves at Tara in Gone with the_Wind , but died during the_filming_and was_replaced with Victor_Jory .
